channel.title: ASF JIRA
channel.description: This file is an XML representation of an issue

item.title: [GROOVY-10877] Record with ThreadInterruptibleASTTransformation applied fails to run
item.description:
@groovy.transform.ThreadInterrupt
record Point(int x, int y) {}

def p = new Point(1, 2)
assert 'Point[x=1, y=2]' == p.toString()

java.lang.ClassFormatError: StackMapTable format error: reserved frame type

	at java.base/java.lang.Class.getDeclaredConstructors0(Native Method)
